title: Align rater images with ICVision strip format
description:
Current rater image generator (rater/scripts/generate_images.py) produces simplified strips that don't match the ICVision classification strips.

Issues:
1. PSD filter cutoff wrong - using 80Hz instead of 55Hz (before notch filter)
2. Missing trial heatmap (ERP image) panel - current strips only have 3 panels (topo, time series, PSD)
3. Need to match the 4-panel strip format used in test_grid_classify.py

Reference: The grid classification experiments use a different strip layout with:
- Topography
- Time series  
- Trial heatmap (ERP image)
- Power spectrum (with 55Hz cutoff)

Action: Update generate_images.py to use the same plotting code as ICVision or refactor to share the strip generation logic.
close_reason: Updated generate_images.py to use exact same 4-panel layout as test_grid_classify.py with 55Hz PSD cutoff and ERP image

title: Human Rater Web App
description:
Distributed scoring platform for EEG experts across the country to validate ICA component classifications.

Stack:
- React + Vite frontend (responsive, keyboard-driven)
- FastAPI backend (integrates with existing Python code)
- Single-component strips for rapid-fire rating

Features:
- Number/letter shortcuts (1/B=Brain, 2/E=Eye, 3/M=Muscle, etc.)
- Experience badge system (Novice/Trained/Expert)
- Response time tracking
- Flagging uncertain components

Data captured: IC index, model label, model confidence, human label, response time, flagged status, rater experience, timestamp

title: Fix keyboard shortcut bugs in ICVision Rater
description:
Bug report findings:
1. Uppercase B does nothing, lowercase b submits twice
2. ? key fails to flag (Shift+/ issue)
3. Undo button requires two clicks sometimes
4. ArrowLeft/Backspace undo inconsistent

Fixes needed:
- Normalize keyboard input to lowercase
- Fix flag shortcut (use 'f' or properly handle Shift+/)
- Debounce/improve undo responsiveness
- Prevent double submissions
close_reason: Fixed: case-insensitive keys, debounce submissions, F for flag, improved undo

title: ICVision Rater: Remaining keyboard/undo edge cases
description:
Post-fix testing revealed remaining edge cases:

1. **Undo delay/jump** - Progress counter momentarily increments before decreasing on undo. UI should wait for server response or show loading indicator.

2. **ArrowLeft vs Left key** - Only ArrowLeft captured, not generic 'Left' key code some frameworks emit.

3. **Shift+letter edge case** - Pressing Shift+B occasionally caused extra increment (may be automation artifact, needs verification).

4. **Post-undo non-response** - Rating immediately after undo sometimes fails on first attempt. isUndoing flag may not reset promptly.

Suggested fixes:
- Optimistic UI update for undo OR loading indicator
- Listen for both 'ArrowLeft' and 'Left' key codes  
- Verify isUndoing flag resets correctly after response
- Add automated tests for keyboard handler edge cases
close_reason: Fixed: Added Left key support, improved undo visual feedback (shows 'Undoing...'), disables all buttons during undo to prevent progress jump
